post_message: An armed group is occupying a building at the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge Federal Preserve in Oregon. "We will be here as long as it takes," said Ammon Bundy, the 40-year-old son of Nevada rancher Cliven Bundy, who is well-known for anti-government action. "We have no intentions of using force upon anyone, (but) if force is used against us, we would defend ourselves."
